short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension blocks certain websites associated with Trump major donor Peter Thiel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On October 15, 2016, Peter Thiel announced a $1.25 million donation in support of Donald Trump's campaign.

Thielblock Plus automatically improves your browsing experience by blocking certain websites associated with Peter Thiel such as news.ycombinator.com, thielfellowship.org and www.palantir.com.  You can still visit these sites by opening an incognito tab.
